### VALUE-ADD SUMMARY
The property at 7841 Stewart Ave was acquired with an original configuration of 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms at a smaller size of 1,965 SF. A significant addition or remodel increased the living space to 2,890 SF, but there is no documentation on the specific value added or timelines for improvements, as all relevant permits are absent. The current listing price is $3,849,000, but without purchase data, the targeted or achieved financial spread remains unspecified.
